def_cn: 忘却,抹去,消除(想法或感受)
def_en: If you erase a thought or feeling, you destroy it completely so that you can no longer remember something or no longer feel a particular emotion.

def_cn: 抹掉（磁带录音）；删除（计算机文件）
def_en: If you erase sound which has been recorded on a tape or information which has been stored in a computer, you completely remove or destroy it.
If you erase something such as writing or a mark, you remove it, usually by rubbing it with a cloth.
